lead_paragraph: António Guterres, the United Nations high commissioner for refugees, and other officials painted an increasingly grim picture of the crisis in the region.

headline.main: U.N. Refugee Official Calls Situation in Syria and Iraq ‘Unsustainable’
headline.print_headline: Top U.N. Refugee Official Warns of ‘Host Fatigue’

snippet: António Guterres, the United Nations high commissioner for refugees, and other officials painted an increasingly grim picture of the crisis in the region.
